original_text: When the Lamb opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature say, “Come!” I looked, and there before me was a black horse! Its rider was holding a pair of scales in his hand.
korean_text: 셋째 인을 떼실 때에 내가 들으니 셋째 생물이 말하되 오라 하기로 내가 보니 검은 말이 나오는데 그 탄 자가 손에 저울을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: When the Lamb opened the third seal
sentences.korean_translation: 어린 양이 셋째 인을 떼었을 때

sentences.original_text: I heard the third living creature say
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 세 번째 생물이 말하는 것을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: and there before me was a black horse

sentences.korean_translation: 그 말을 탄 자가 손에 들고 있었으니

sentences.original_text: a pair of scales in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 손에 저울 한 쌍을 들고 있더라
